jerseytest1.jerseytest1

类 enqueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • jerseytest1.jerseytest1.enqueue

  • @Path(value="/jerseyws")
public class enqueue
extends java.lang.Object
    enqueue class is a large class of the RESTful backend JAVA class methods These methods contain the interact with GAE APIs including Datastore, Memcache, Blobstore, Taskqueue Imageservice, User APIs With these APIs we could utilize the Paas(Platform as a service) structure of Web Development
    作者:
    LiuYuan

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      enqueue() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getUserName()
      getUserName method is a method that will return the login user's nickname to the frontend via AJAX
      java.lang.String loginOut()
      loginOut method is a method in charge of returning the log out url to the front end for users to log out this method will also delete the login info in the memcache and other users once update info from the memcache will get this log out info of this user
      java.lang.String markerInit()
      markerInit method is in charge of getting all the markers that have been stored in the datastore back to the frontend via AJAX using JSON as the data format
      java.lang.String msg(java.lang.String json)
      msg is a method in charge of using the Taskqueue API to queue the operation that will store data into the datastore
      java.lang.String postUser(java.lang.String json)
      postUser is a method that is in charge of getting the user's geo location info and user's nickname stored into the memcache and returns all the registered user info back to the frontend with these registered user info the frontend could consult whether these registered users have login from the memcache
      java.lang.String receiveMsg()
      receiveMsg method is the opposite method of sendMsg method this method will get the chat msg sent to the user who sent the GET request from frontend
      java.lang.String sendMsg(java.lang.String json)
      sendMsg method is a method in charge of storing the chatting msg info from different users into the memcache so the destination users will find the msgs sent to them in the memcache once succeed this method will return "success"
      void upload(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
      uplad method is the method in charge of storing the uploaded pic as the user's logo and stores the pic's url into that user's datastore next time the user is retrieving data from the datastore the user will get his logo's url and show his account logo on the User marker
      java.lang.String userInit(java.lang.String json)
      userInit is a method in charge of getting all the login users from the memcache param json sent in is the JSON format data of all the registered users info from the frontend this json is also got from the backend method these login users info will be sent back to the frontend via AJAX using JSON data format
      void Worker(java.lang.String json)
      Worker method is a method that will store the marker info into the datastore from Taskqueue operations json is the Msg format JSON data

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public enqueue()

    • 方法详细资料

      • msg

        @POST
@Path(value="/enqueue/")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String msg(java.lang.String json)
        msg is a method in charge of using the Taskqueue API to queue the operation that will store data into the datastore

      • markerInit

        @GET
@Path(value="/markerinit/")
public java.lang.String markerInit()
        markerInit method is in charge of getting all the markers that have been stored in the datastore back to the frontend via AJAX using JSON as the data format
        返回:
        JSON(String)

      • userInit

        @POST
@Path(value="/userinit/")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String userInit(java.lang.String json)
        userInit is a method in charge of getting all the login users from the memcache param json sent in is the JSON format data of all the registered users info from the frontend this json is also got from the backend method these login users info will be sent back to the frontend via AJAX using JSON data format
        参数:
        json -
        返回:

      • getUserName

        @GET
@Path(value="/getusername/")
public java.lang.String getUserName()
        getUserName method is a method that will return the login user's nickname to the frontend via AJAX
        返回:
        nickname(String)

      • postUser

        @POST
@Path(value="/postuser/")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String postUser(java.lang.String json)
        postUser is a method that is in charge of getting the user's geo location info and user's nickname stored into the memcache and returns all the registered user info back to the frontend with these registered user info the frontend could consult whether these registered users have login from the memcache
        参数:
        json(JSON - format of latlng class)
        返回:
        registeredUsersInfo(JSON format)

      • loginOut

        @GET
@Path(value="/loginout/")
public java.lang.String loginOut()
        loginOut method is a method in charge of returning the log out url to the front end for users to log out this method will also delete the login info in the memcache and other users once update info from the memcache will get this log out info of this user
        返回:

      • Worker

        @POST
@Path(value="/worker/")
public void Worker(java.lang.String json)
        Worker method is a method that will store the marker info into the datastore from Taskqueue operations json is the Msg format JSON data
        参数:
        json -

      • sendMsg

        @POST
@Path(value="/sendmsg/")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public java.lang.String sendMsg(java.lang.String json)
        sendMsg method is a method in charge of storing the chatting msg info from different users into the memcache so the destination users will find the msgs sent to them in the memcache once succeed this method will return "success"
        参数:
        json -
        返回:

      • receiveMsg

        @GET
@Path(value="/receivemsg/")
public java.lang.String receiveMsg()
        receiveMsg method is the opposite method of sendMsg method this method will get the chat msg sent to the user who sent the GET request from frontend
        返回:

      • upload

        @POST
@Path(value="/upload")
public void upload(@Context
                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                    @Context
                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        uplad method is the method in charge of storing the uploaded pic as the user's logo and stores the pic's url into that user's datastore next time the user is retrieving data from the datastore the user will get his logo's url and show his account logo on the User marker
        参数:
        req -
        res -
        抛出:
